'''''An Immortal Emperor in a Mundane Universe''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must defeat [[Narzissenkreuz (Enemy)|Narzissenkreuz]] during the {{Quest|Waking from the Great Dream (Quest)}}.

==Trivia==
* This achievement's name is also the title of the OST from Episode 26 of the anime TV series {{W|Revolutionary Girl Utena}}.
